item.description:
Join us for our inaugural meetup where we will enjoy an inspiring video, meet members and share ideas on future meetup topics and events! We'll also share a potluck meal!

Located a 1/4 mile west of the Ipswich commuter rail station. The train might be a good travel option for some.

Dogs and cats are in residence, though they won't be attending the meetup. Just a heads up to those with serious allergies.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal that opens the door.
item.name: Movie and Meet the Members Potluck
